short_summary: Free Fall Parachute Instructors: SA W2037-190001/XXX/KIN
description: This requirement is for Department of National Defence
full_summary:
# **Free Fall Parachute Instructors**

## **Notice of Proposed Procurement**

### **Solicitation Number**

W2037-25-0015

### **Notice Details**

*   **Publication Date:** April 17, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date:** April 30, 2024 12:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** August 26, 2024
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** September 9, 2024

### **Procurement Details**

*   **Procurement Category:** SRV (Services)
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive Open Bidding
*   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
*   **Regions of Opportunity:** Ontario (excluding NCR)
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   **Description of Requirement:** The Department of National Defence requires Point of Decision (POD) Certified ENA PSB P (MRF) Instructors for the operation of the CDL ( Crew Driven Landing) GAT Rev D Functional item on the platforms detailed below:
    *   Search and Rescue (SAR)
    
    *   Transportation of Soldiers (TOS)    
    *   US Attack/ Response/ Protocols
    *   The Supply Arrangement is to be operated out of CFB Trenton in Ontario.
*   **Attached Document:** NPP [PDF](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/36146/240409_caawc_25015m_npp.pdf)

### **Contracting Entity Details**

*   **Contracting Entity Name:** Combat Training Centre
*   **Contracting Entity Address:** Building H16, Room 111, OROMOCTO, NB, E2V 4J5, CANADA
*   **Contact Information:**
    *   **Contact Name:** Maura Archibald
    *   **Contact Email:** maura.archibald@forces.gc.ca
    *   **Contact Phone Number:** (506) 422-2731
    *   **Alternate Contact Information:**
        *   **Alternate Contact Name:** Nicole Shannon
        *   **Alternate Contact Email:** nicole.shannon@forces.gc.ca
